attributes.action: Make political parties manifestos legally binding.
attributes.additional_details: It's too easy to make promises pre-election which when in power they don't follow up on, and at the moment there's no mechanism for holding them accountable other than waiting 5 years till the next election
attributes.background:
An Independent panel should monitor that the new government follows through on its pre-election promises.  If after a period of time the panel decides that the promises are not being kept, then a warning should be issued
Following this if its still in breach then a new election must be called.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700035
